description: Replace 3+ fragmented context menu implementations with single universal system using entity converter pattern. Fix architectural issues: eager loading, inconsistent caching, missing card-level actions, code duplication.

orchestrator_instructions.role: Phase coordinator - validate agent outputs, synthesize cross-agent insights, manage phase gates

steps.step_1: READ each agent's outputs/ directory after phase completion
steps.step_2: VALIDATE phase gate criteria (all tasks complete, outputs valid, tests passing)
steps.step_4: CREATE orchestrator-synthesis.md with overall status and recommendations
steps.step_5: UPDATE session communication.json with phase statuses and aggregation counts

agent_instructions.role: Execute phase-specific tasks in isolated workspace following agent subdirectory instructions

steps.step_1: NAVIGATE to your agent subdirectory: {session}/{ agent-id}/
steps.step_2: READ resources/index.md to access all source documents
steps.step_3: READ instructions.json for detailed execution steps and context_json_template
steps.step_4: RUN /create-workorder in agent home using context_json_template
steps.step_5: UPDATE communication.json: Add workorder to outputs.workorders_created[]
steps.step_6: EXECUTE tasks - update communication.json after each task
steps.step_8: VALIDATE phase_gate checklist - all criteria must pass

output_format: Mixed (TypeScript components, JSON converters, Markdown docs)

quality_standards.completeness: All 3 agents complete their phase tasks, phase gates pass
quality_standards.accuracy: Type-safe converters, no regressions in AddFileToBoardMenu, tests pass
quality_standards.format: TypeScript for code, JSON for converters, Markdown for docs
